entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
